about_the_game:
What's included in the demo

1 Title screen
2 Tutorial play (all)
3 Main story one stage (partial) to experience floating ship operation
4 Main story Character operation experience one stage (partial)


You can play the beginning part of the basic flow of the game as a trial version. If you advance the trial version to a certain point, you will automatically transition to the next stage, and if you advance to the end point of the trial version, the game will end automatically. If you like it, please buy the product version.

Also, please use the trial version as an operation check to see if the game works properly on your computer. The game itself consumes 4.2GB of memory, especially in areas where memory usage is high. Please check the operation with 4.5 GB or more of free memory other than the Windows system. Make sure you can always maintain above 30FPS for smooth gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes:
Expressions of violence and gore
"There is a drawing that reproduces fake blood, where a person dies."

nudity or sexual content
"On the one hand, we used a free camera angle, but on the other hand, we were able to capture the character's underwear."
"There are no expressions such as sexual intercourse between men and women."
Also, in photography mode, the character may be penetrated, and the camera may show the inside of the clothing. (Only product version can start photo mode)

detailed_description:
What's included in the demo

1 Title screen
2 Tutorial play (all)
3 Main story one stage (partial) to experience floating ship operation
4 Main story Character operation experience one stage (partial)


You can play the beginning part of the basic flow of the game as a trial version. If you advance the trial version to a certain point, you will automatically transition to the next stage, and if you advance to the end point of the trial version, the game will end automatically. If you like it, please buy the product version.

Also, please use the trial version as an operation check to see if the game works properly on your computer. The game itself consumes 4.2GB of memory, especially in areas where memory usage is high. Please check the operation with 4.5 GB or more of free memory other than the Windows system. Make sure you can always maintain above 30FPS for smooth gameplay.

name: 契約の浮遊船　失った記憶と空の遺跡 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 9 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 580X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: I did not conduct an actual machine survey, but describe the requirements for estimated values. If you are worried about the computer system requirements , please check if the trial version can maintain 30-40FPS or more before purchasing.SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5-9300H or Ryzen 5 3550H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 6800S
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: I did not conduct an actual machine survey, but describe the requirements for estimated values. If you are worried about the computer system requirements , please check if the trial version can maintain 30-40FPS or more before purchasing.SSD recommended

short_description: You can play the beginning part of the basic flow of the game as a trial version. You can check the atmosphere, operation feeling, and view of the world of the work before purchasing. Please also check if it works properly on your computer.
